DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two surgical technique ( high vacuum low vacuum ) corneal endothelium phacoemulsification .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Hydrodynamic Parameters Corneal Endothelial Cell Loss After Phacoemulsification
DOC.detailed_description: Patients age 50 70 year old moderate lens opacity ( nuclear sclerosis 3+ ) include . The exclusion criterion : 1-previous corneal pathology ( dystrophic degenerative Fuchs ' endothelial dystrophy advance trachoma ) , 2- pseudoexfoliation syndrome ( PEX ) , 3- history intra ocular surgery , 4- glaucoma ocular hypertension , 5- eye history anterior uveitis , 6- diabetes mellitus , 7- anterior chamber depth ( ACD ) less 2.5 mm 4 mm , 8- axial length le 21 mm 25 mm , 9- density endothelial cell less 1500 cell per mm2 , 10- polymegatism ( CV > 0.4 ) , 11- keratometric astigmatism 1.5 Diopters ( D ) , 12- history contact lens usage , 13- Intra-operative complication ( posterior capsule rupture without vitreous loss ) , 14- postoperative uveitis , 15- postoperative surgical wound leakage , 16- deep-set eye , 17- size dilate pupil le 6 mm . Nucleus density evaluate use LOCS III classification system Patients divide 2 group randomly : Group 1 include candidate phacoemulsification use high hydrodynamic parameter : 400 mmHg vacuum 40 ml/min flow rate ( high vacuum technique ) whereas group 2 consist patient underwent phacoemulsification use low hydrodynamic parameter : 200 mmHg vacuum 20 ml/min flow rate ( low vacuum technique ) . All surgery perform one surgeon use stop chop technique sovereign ( white star technology ) ( AMO , USA ) . During sculpt stage , vacuum 40mmHg flow rate 20ml/min , group . Irrigation aspiration cortical material viscoelastic bimanually semi automatically perform flow rate 30ml/min . Total ultrasound power total volume BSS group measure . Pachymetry , endothelial cell density , polymegathism , 1 , 6 12 week intervention also evaluate . Statistically analysis data include univariate ( student t-test x2 ) multivariate ( regression model ) analysis postoperative result .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Moderate lens opacity ( Nuclear sclerosis 3+ ) Age 50 70 year The exclusion criterion : Previous corneal pathology ( dystrophic degenerative Fuchs ' endothelial dystrophy advance trachoma ) , Pseudoexfoliation syndrome ( PEX ) , History intra ocular surgery , Glaucoma ocular hypertension , Eyes history anterior uveitis , Diabetes mellitus , Anterior chamber depth ( ACD ) less 2.5 mm 4 mm , Axial length le 21 mm 25 mm , Density endothelial cell less 1500 cell per mm2 , Polymegatism ( CV > 0.4 ) , Keratometric astigmatism 1.5 Diopters ( D ) , History contact lens usage , Intraoperative complication ( posterior capsule rupture without vitreous loss ) , Postoperative uveitis , Postoperative surgical wound leakage , Deepset eye , 17 size dilate pupil le 6 mm .
